TopicTitle: BISE - Brix's Institute of Space Exploration

Articles.Content:
Hello!

My name is BriXman, as written in the title, and this is the thread where I'll log adventures in Kerbal Space Program!

As an introduction, I will be playing career mode here, and there will be a little bit of roleplaying, if you've read Brotoro's Long-term Laythe mission, which is the inspiration to this thread.

Naturally, we will start with missions on Kerbin. First entry coming soon!

-Brix
